trans-unit.source: Scales an object in the three-dimensional x-y-z plane, starting from a defined center point.
trans-unit.target: 从已定义的中心点开始，在三维 x-y-z 平面中缩放对象。

trans-unit.source: Scale factors are defined in x-, y-, and z- directions from this center point.
trans-unit.target: 将定义在该中心点的 x、y 和 z 方向上的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 转换沿其缩放的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Vector3D along which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 转换沿其缩放的 Vector3D。

trans-unit.source: Center around which the transformation scales.
trans-unit.target: 转换缩放时所围绕的中心。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> and <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 和 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D" /> 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Point3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the X value.
trans-unit.target: 缩放 X 值时采用的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Y value.
trans-unit.target: 缩放 Y 值时采用的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Z value.
trans-unit.target: 缩放 Z 值时采用的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified scale factors.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的缩放比例初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the X value.
trans-unit.target: 缩放 X 值时采用的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Y value.
trans-unit.target: 缩放 Y 值时采用的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Factor by which to scale the Z value.
trans-unit.target: 缩放 Z 值时采用的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: X coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 作为缩放起始位置的中心点的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Y coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 作为缩放起始位置的中心点的 Y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Z coordinate of the center point from which to scale.
trans-unit.target: 作为缩放起始位置的中心点的 Z 坐标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> class using the specified center coordinates and scale factors.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的中心坐标和缩放比例初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置转换中心点的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The x-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 转换中心点的 X 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterX" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置转换中心点的 z 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The y-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 转换中心点的 y 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterY" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置转换中心点的 z 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The z-coordinate of the transform's center point.
trans-unit.target: 转换中心点的 Z 坐标。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>0</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>0</c>。

trans-unit.source: Dependency Property Information
trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.CenterZ" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 的可修改克隆，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定（但可能不再解析），但不复制动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true." />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D" /> 对象的可修改复本，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、数据绑定和动画，而是复制其当前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性为 <see langword="true" />，所克隆的对象的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 属性也将为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详情，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scale factor in the x-direction.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 x 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the x-direction.
trans-unit.target: x 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>1</c>。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleX" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scale factor in the y-direction.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 y 轴方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the y-direction.
trans-unit.target: y 轴方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>1</c>。

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`

trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleY" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleY" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the scale factor in the z-direction.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置 z 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: Scale factor in the z-direction.
trans-unit.target: z 方向的缩放比例。

trans-unit.source: The default value is <c>1</c>.
trans-unit.target: 默认值是<c>1</c>。

trans-unit.target: 依赖项属性信息

trans-unit.source: Identifier field
trans-unit.target: 标识符字段

trans-unit.source: Metadata properties set to `true`
trans-unit.target: 元数据属性设置为 `true`

trans-unit.source: None
trans-unit.target: 无

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleZ" /> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ScaleTransform3D.ScaleZ" /> 依赖项属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> representation of this transformation.
trans-unit.target: 获取此转换的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 表示形式。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> representation of this transformation.
trans-unit.target: 此转换的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Matrix3D" /> 表示形式。
